mdRecord.dcterms:title: Sir Ronald Lindsay and Lady Lindsay at Mount Vernon, April 14, 1939
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white photograph of Sir Ronald Lindsay, British Ambassador to the United States, and his wife Lady Elizabeth Lindsay attending an event at Mount Vernon, April 14, 1939. The event commemorates the 150th anniversary of George Washington's notification [April 14, 1789] of his election to the presidency. Seated on the piazza, the Lindsays are special guests awaiting remarks by President Franklin D. Roosevelt.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (Va. : Estate)
Anniversary
